m_szDocSumamry: Smaller, cheaper Toyota Mirai fuel-cell car coming in 2019, company says Email This Page To (separate emails with commas) Message (optional) Your email was sent successfully. Close 4 views May 9, 2016 Follow John To increase the reach of its hybrid cars, Toyota launched the Prius C subcompact in 2012 as a smaller, less expensive alternative to the Prius Liftback that's the linchpin of its lineup. Now, Toyota says it may be planning to do something similar with its Mirai hydrogen fuel-cell vehicle. The 2016 Toyota Mirai was launched last year in Japan, Europe, and North America.
